title: Did Kamala Harris say that she would sign an executive order to confiscate weapons?
subtitle: The United States Democratic candidate 2020 definitely on the record says she wants stronger laws to control weapons, but what exactly did she say?
author: Dan Evon
vclaim: Mr. Kamala Harris said: "If the [President] is elected and you do not surrender your weapons, I will sign an executive order and the police will appear at your door."
